name: 英文（一）
comment: 文學院（英語系除外）、藝術學院、科技學院、車能學位學程、體育系、台文系、華語系一年級 (能力分班)
restrict: ◎第一階段需人工加選◎第二階段需人工加選◎加退選階段需人工加選
description: 共同科英文（一）課程為一學年課程，每學期兩學分，係為非英語系學生所開設的課程。目標在幫助大一學生活用中學時期所累積的英語知識，提昇英語聽、說、讀、寫整體的溝通能力。為達此目標，本課程要求教師盡量用英語上課，努力營造一個豐富的英語環境，讓學生不但有充分機會以英語參與課堂活動，且樂於使用英語與同學及老師溝通。
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
**Freshmen English (HIGH-INT.)**

**Course Description**

This course is designed to support students in their use of English language in academic context. Through intensive and extended reading of text materials, as well as engagement in production activities, students are expected to acquire communication strategies for reading, listening, speaking, and writing, develop fluency and autonomy, and improve their critical thinking skills.

**Required Text**

Daise, D., Norloff, C., & Carne, P., _Q: Skills for Success: Reading and Writing, 4._

New York: Oxford University Press.

**Course Requirements**

1.  Midterm (20%) and Final (25%)

\--The exams will cover reading selections from the book.

1.  Activities & Assignments (30%)

\--There will be (2) writing assignments, (2) short speeches, and (2) class activities

1.  Class Participation (15%).
2.  Lexile Book Summaries (10%)

**Attendance Policy**

Regular class attendance is vital to academic success. Three unexcused absences will result in a failing grade. If for any reason you can't attend a class session, please inform the instructor with a short email beforehand.

**On Plagiarism and Cheating**

Plagiarism is a **SERIOUS CRIME** and will thus be treated seriously. Refer to the NTNU Handbook for policy and disciplinary actions on plagiarism and cheating.

**Course Schedule**

Week 1 – No Class (Holiday)

Week 2 – Introduction; Course Preliminaries

Week 3 & 4 – Unit 1: We All Need a Role Model

Week 5 – No Class (Holiday)

Week 6 & 7 – Unit 2: So Much Dead Space

Week 8 – Class Actvity

Week 9 – Midterm

Week 10 – No Class (Sports Day)

Week 11 – Short Speech #1

Week 12 & 13 – Unit 3: The Good Teen

Week 14 & 15 – Unit 4: Two Styles of Writing

Week 16 – Class Activity

Week 17 – Final

Week 18 – Short Speech #2
